src:
Sporočilo uredništvom - izjava za medije direktorja SŽ-Infrastruktura Kranjca

06 Nov 2019, 07:55


Ljubljana, 6. novembra - Direktor SŽ-Infrastruktura Matjaž Kranjc bo danes ob 11.30 na Kolodvorski 11 dal izjavo za medije glede današnjega iztirjenja tovornega vlaka na železniški postaji Breg pri Zidanem Mostu, so sporočili iz Slovenskih železnic.
text:
Message to the editorial staff - press statement by the director of SŽ-Infrastructure Kranjac

06 Nov 2019, 07:55


Ljubljana, 6 November - Director of SZ-Infrastructure Matjaz Kranjc will make a statement today at 11.30 at Kolodvorska 11 regarding the derailment of a freight train at the Breg railway station near Zidani Most, Slovenian Railways said.
